Very nice!  I think I will refer people to this who are new to these concepts.

There is a bug currently:  The "Use your mouse to interact with the scene" ray gets its intersections calculated according to our view of the scene, whereas it should be according to the ray's origin as depicted.
It's great! I love the slide where you interact with the ray direction!
Now that's a lot of text! Wonderful work.
